description: FDA 510(k) device archetype matrix for automated test harness

archetypes.label: Simple Powered Device
archetypes.notes: Electrosurgical generator/pencil. Non-sterile, powered, Class II. Tests electrical safety (IEC 60601-1), EMC. No biocompat/sterilization needed.

archetypes.label: Sterile Catheter
archetypes.notes: Percutaneous cardiovascular catheter. EO sterilized, blood-contacting, single-use. Tests ISO 10993, ISO 11135, shelf life ASTM F1980.

archetypes.label: Software as Medical Device
archetypes.notes: Digital pathology SaMD. No patient contact, no sterilization, no biocompat. Tests IEC 62304 software lifecycle, cybersecurity (Section 524B).

archetypes.label: In Vitro Diagnostic
archetypes.notes: Hexokinase glucose IVD. Different eSTAR template (FDA 4078 vs 4062). Clinical chemistry panel (reg# 862.x). CLIA waiver considerations. Analytical performance (precision, accuracy, linearity).

archetypes.label: Combination Product (Drug+Device)
archetypes.notes: Wound dressing with drug component. OTC labeling, Class U possible. Drug-device interaction testing, shelf life for drug stability.

archetypes.label: Orthopedic Implant
archetypes.notes: Cervical fusion implant. PEEK+titanium materials, implantable (>30 days), MRI conditional testing (ASTM F2052/F2213), fatigue/static testing.

archetypes.label: Reusable Surgical Instrument
archetypes.notes: Reusable laparoscopic instrument. Autoclave reprocessing validation, cleaning validation, limited biocompat (mucosal contact). Human factors for complex assembly/disassembly.

archetypes.label: Home-Use OTC Device
archetypes.notes: Consumer laser device. OTC labeling (21 CFR Part C), human factors summative study, IEC 60601-1-11 home healthcare, lay user instructions.

archetypes.label: Wireless/BT Connected Device
archetypes.notes: Cardiovascular monitor with Bluetooth. Cybersecurity Section 524B, wireless coexistence testing (ANSI C63.27), EMC per IEC 60601-1-2, software IEC 62304.
